args: Please note that this story contains spoilers\nfor the ＂Kindness and Captivity＂ event.
The prince's castle is just through\nthis forest, Sylvia.
We owe the prince so very much. To think\nwe will now be able to rally around him!
Well, this is the perfect time, now that our\nhome has finally recovered from the\ndamage it suffered at the Empire's hands.
Now let's get moving and repay that debt!
Goodness! I haven't laid eyes on this\ncastle in quite some time. I do hope\nthe prince finds himself well.
And I suppose I will see Sarisse\nagain, too.
I imagine you will. How exciting!
I'm just...scared. After all I have done...
Why would you say that?\nWhy are you apologizing?
You're confusing me, Melsa...\nYou're making it sound like this is\nyour fault somehow...
Every now and then, I see the face\nSarisse made back then...
I deceived everyone. That's a fact,\nand I can never take it back.
Forgive me, Melsa. This is all my fault.
Had I not been captured by the Empire,\nyou would not have suffered so.
Don't say that. All that I did,\nI did of my own free will.
I have to atone for the mistakes I made.\nIt doesn't matter how long it takes—I will\nkeep at it until everyone forgives me!
So that is how you intend to take\nresponsibility for your actions, is it?
Very well. In that case, I shall accompany\nyou in seeing your resolve through.
Wait, that voice... Could it be?!
Oh, I've missed you so much! You have NO\nidea how long I've been waiting for this!
I'm so happy I could just EXPLODE!\nWe have SO much to catch up on!
How have you been? Did you have a rough\ntime out there? How is Sylvia? Has the\nvillage gotten back on its feet?
E-easy, Sarisse! I can only answer\nso many questions at once...
Whoops! Sorry about that! Look at me,\njust shouting whatever pops into my head.
I'm just jazzed you're here, I guess, 'cause\nnow you and me can hang out and have\ntons of fun every single day!
Every day...? Wait, no. Hold on.
Huh? What's up? Why the long face?
I'm just thinking that I need to stay\nfocused and on task here...
I did not come here for fun and frolic.\nI came here to atone for my sins.
Wait, you're not talking about that whole\n＂luring us into a trap＂ thing, are you?
Because if that's all it is, don't sweat it!\nHeck, I pretty much forgot all about it,\nso I'm sure you're overthinking th—
All of you came to my rescue even\nafter all the horrible things I did.
There is no swaying me in this, Sarisse:\nI will atone for my sins and pay my debts!
And I will do so for everyone in this\ncastle—including the prince and you!
Okay, okay! Sheesh, no need to get so\nfired up about all this.
Say, Melsa? What do you say\nyou and me go for a walk?
Now is not the time; I must go and\nexplain to everyone how I feel!
Yeaaaah, let's put a pin in that. If you\nshow up with that scowly face, you're\ngonna send everybody running in fear!
So let's take a break and reset\nyour growly mood, all right?

*siiigh* You aren't going to let this
go, are you? Fine then, Melsa—just
what do you intend to do to
＂repay your debts,＂ anyway?
Anything! Just tell me what to do,\nand I will see it done!
ANYTHING? Okay, this is really going\ntoo far. Besides, it's not like you did all\nthat bad stuff because you WANTED to.
Even so, I have to do this or I will\nnever be able to earn forgiveness.
No matter what my reasons were,\nmy sins will not simply wash away!
All right. You wanna atone and junk? Cool.\nI'm in. But that means you have to do\nwhatever I think that requires, right?
You have but to name it! Now please,\nwhat would you have me do?!
I'm not going to just TELL you!\nInstead...you're gonna take a quiz.
GUESS what it is that I want from you.
Must we really do this in such a\nroundabout way?
You bet your pants! Now come on.\nMake with the guessing already.
Here's a hint: the way to repay me\nis something ONLY you can do!
Something only I can do...? Ah!\nYou want me to divine the weather!
What? No. Why would I want that?\nOkay, lemme give you another hint...
This is something you could do RIGHT here\nand RIGHT now if you wanted to.
Hmm. Well, that eliminates chores or\nhelping you hunt or the like...
BZZZZZT! Sorry, you're out of time!\nOkay, one last hint...
...You already know the answer.\nI told you the moment you showed up.
I'm just jazzed you're here, I guess, 'cause\nnow you and me can hang out and have\ntons of fun every single day!
Hmmmm? Did you figure it out?
But I am supposed to atone! To repay you!
Oh, I know. And this is what I want.
Then the way I pay you back is...
By hanging out with you and having\ntons of fun every single day?
Ding ding ding! We have a winner!\nIt's fun, fun, fun, from here on out!
Er, but that doesn't seem like atonement\nso much as...friendship.
Of COURSE it is, you big goof!\nWe're FRIENDS!

Look, you can go bow and scrape and
atone or whatever to everyone else,
but it's gonna make things suuuper
weird if you do that with me.
Although honestly, I doubt there's a\nsingle person in this castle who wants\nyou to do something like that.
Nobody resents you, Melsa. No one's mad.\nWe all understand you had no choice.
So put away the hair shirt and the\nflagellation whip already, because it's\nonly gonna make everyone uncomfortable.
Goodness. Perhaps I was going\nabout this all wrong...
Heh. Well, you wouldn't be you if you\ndidn't turn into a total stressball about\nsomething like that.
Anyway, now that that's sorted, if you still\nREALLY want to apologize to everyone,\nwe can start making the rounds.
Luca's always looking for folks to hang\nwith, and I know Cleo would love having\nsomeone to help out with the chores...
Maybe starting good relationships is the\nbest way for you to pay folks back.
I understand now. Thank you, Sarisse.
(I had it all wrong. There is so much more\nto atoning than what I envisioned.)
(Forcing my guilt onto those around me\nis but another form of selfishness.)
(Still, coming face to face with everyone\nand getting to know them will be...)
(Well, it will be difficult for an introvert\nlike myself. Still, that doesn't mean that\nI CAN'T make it happen!)
(Especially when I have a great friend\nlike Sarisse by my side!)
(There was a step I could never bring\nmyself to make because I felt so weighed\ndown by what I had done...)
(But so long as Sarisse is with me,\nI know I can make that step!)
Sarisse, I'm very happy to be here and to\nbe your friend.
And I'm happy to have you.\nWelcome to the Halidom!
